task.title: Configuring the show command to display 20 representative IMSIs for an input PLMN
task.shortdesc: Use Commands subsImsiDisplay and subsImsiDisplayAdmin to display 20 representative IMSIs for an input PLMN.

step.info: TheÂ subImsiDisplayAdmin modify command starts the walk of the IPDS by setting taskOp parameter to dump. If there is already another task for the IPDS dump is in progress, then this command is rejected with error.

step.cmd: Check the status of the IMSI collect process in IPDS.
List the IMSIs found for this PLMN.

stepxmp.codeph: cmm subsImsiDisplay list [--radioType2g3g true --radioType4g true --radioType5g true]

step.info: The subsImsiDisplay list command lists the IMSIs collected by the IPDS matching the PLMN. Operator cannot update the imsiCount parameter if the subsImsiDisplayAdmin command is already in running state. Only the taskOp parameter can be updated. The taskOp parameter is set to clear when the ongoing collection task is interrupted in the IDPS. The list of IMSI collected so far is cleared. The list command does not show any entries if no task is running.

step.cmd: Stop a running task and start the new task run following.
